## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1e84b6fcb318d2b4cf4fc650d67ffb94a0622eb47d6b88e8662bdb6b2dc62930)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-lu-luxtrust-stick-authentication' @ 200.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
